name: Black Ice Shoulder Pads
description: The Black Ice pauldrons offer maximum protection to the wearer. The raised sword guards protect the neck from glancing blows and the unique two tone pattern adds a little class to this high fantasy pauldron set.

name: Warrior Larp Pauldrons
description: Our Larp Warrior Pauldrons feature a simple row of studs adorning the edges of this pair of polished steel shoulder pads. Large plates followed by four smaller lames help protect the larp warrior from blows to the upper arms and shoulders. Gorget sold separately.

name: Churburg Pauldron, Dark
description: The Black Churburg Pauldron are made to be worn with the Imperial Gambeson and is an excellent choice for Larp Soldier. Small and fixable, it’s perfect for epic fights. Its unique style seems to come directly from story books and fits well with costumes of any period.

name: Churburg Shoulders
description: The Churburg larp pauldron set was designed to fit onto the imperial gambeson and goes well with any style warrior. These high polished pauldrons have a simplistic style that reflects the designs from past. Easily adjusted to fit anyone this set of medieval shoulder pads is sure to make a statement.

name: Undead Pauldrons
description: This set of undead pauldrons were blackened by the blood of many fallen warriors. This unique pair of black shoulder guards will fit most anyone and provide protection both front and back. Use the shield on the top of the pauldron to paint your family crest or to indicate your faction.

name: Gothic Pauldrons Set
description: German Gothic Larp pauldron set have a beautifully shaped wing following the shape and movement of the shoulder. Our medieval gothic gorget shoulders are sold together as a set comprising of the gorget, and the left and the right shoulder.

name: Merc Spaulders
description: Mercenary Larp Spaulders are the perfect shoulder armor for the basic warrior. This pair of shiny basic Larp pauldrons has rolled edges and articulated lames. This small pair of metal pauldrons help protect the upper arms from glancing blows during Larp fights fitting tightly around your arms making it ideal for close quarter Larp combat. Gorget sold...

name: Giant Warrior Pauldrons, Dark
description: This set of extra-large of Giant Dark Warrior Larp pauldrons are forged from mild steel and come with a lame guard. Ideal for virtually any era and for any Larp warrior, this pair of Larp shoulder pads definitely provide defense where needed. Customize tour character by making you appear enormous with this awesome set. Gorget sold separately!

name: Giant Warrior Pauldron
description: The oversized pair of Giant Warrior Larp pauldrons are crafted from mild steel and comes with a lame guard. Perfect for any period and for every Larp warrior these medieval shoulder pads really give protection and visible mass to your Larp character. Make your character look massive and bulk up your armor with this awesome set. Gorget sold separately!

name: Dark Drake Pauldron
description: Forged with mild steel, this pair of Dark Drake Larp pauldrons are coated with a durable rust resistant finish and have a unique raised line pattern that will distinguish you on the battlefield. Made to fit almost any fighter, this shoulder armor protects your upper arms giving you the proper protection during Larp battle. Gorget sold separately!

name: King Pauldron
description: Crafted from mild steel this pair of King Larp pauldrons feature a raised patter with an acid washed finish. Made to suite any medieval warrior these Larp pauldrons offer the perfect protection on the shoulders and upper arms making it the right armor for any Larp battle. Gorget sold separately!

name: Warrior Pauldrons, Dark
description: Our pair of Dark Warrior Larp Pauldrons are crafted from mild steel and coated with a durable rust resistant finish. Perfect for any period and for every character these Larp shoulder pads really do the job. One larger plate followed by four smaller lames help protect the dark knight from blows to the upper arm during Larp battle. Gorget sold separately!

name: Rogue Neck and Shoulders
description: Part of a new series combining leather and metal plates, this set of leather Pauldrons will give the attention your Larp characters is looking for. This armor comes with the protection for the neck and the shoulders, so you’ll be able to win all of next Larp fights!
